summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on July 27, 2019, including inmate count sheets, rosters, and assignment logs. It records the official inmate population count and assignments for that date, notably listing Jeffrey Epstein as an inmate with an attorney visit assignment.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Listed as an inmate with an attorney visit assignment (ATTY) on the inmate roster for July 27, 2019, at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count and Assignments at MCC New York
events.description: Routine administrative procedures at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, including official inmate counts, housing unit tallies, and assignment of inmates to activities like attorney visits, hospital, education, and laundry.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 27, 2019.
The document records an official out-count of the inmate population, totaling 767 inmates, later verified as 751.
Epstein is specifically listed on an 'Inmate Roster' with an assignment category of 'ATTY' (attorney) for that date.
The forms are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative documents for tracking inmate location, count, and daily assignments.
The date of these records is ten days before Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
